articles.title: Man United 'ready to offer' £38m to sign Rasmus Hojlund from Atalanta - Old Trafford Faithful
articles.description: Man United are 'ready to offer' £38m to sign Rasmus Hojlund from Atalanta, though the Dane is expected to cost way more than that...
articles.content:
Image via: David Dixon/Geograph.
CC BY-SA 2.0. OTF Logo added.
Man United are all set to make an offer to sign Rasmus Hojlund from Atalanta.
A new striker has to be atop the list of needs for Manc… [+1723 chars]
